ConfirmDialog.message: Are you sure you want to delete this tag? Once you delete it, it will be removed from all citizens and all reports. This action cannot be undone.

ExportDialog.exportAllData: Export all data types and values:

PatientListPage.name: Name
PatientListPage.createACitizen: Create a citizen and start collecting data
PatientListPage.anonymizeWarning: By proceeding, the name and contact details (phone and email) for this citizen will be hidden for all non-admin users. Only admin users can reverse this action.
PatientListPage.deAnonymizeWarning: By proceeding, the name and contact details (phone and email) for the selected citizens will become visible. All users on this project will be able to see this currently hidden information.
PatientListPage.deactivateWarning: By proceeding, the selected patients will be deactivated. They will no longer be able to receive questionnaires and respond to them.
PatientListPage.reactivateWarning: By proceeding, the selected patients will be reactivated. They will be able to receive questionnaires and respond to them again.

If you proceed, you will no longer be able to send reminders for this dispatch or see any messages about it. However, the citizen can still respond to the dispatch on their own initiative.

general.description: Letâ€™s start with what this report (or forcast) is about. Give it a name, executive summary and, if you want, put a logo on the front page.

reportName.max: Report name must be no more than 30 characters

executiveSummary.max: Executive summary must be no more than 600 characters

intervention.title: Tell us about your intervention
intervention.description: Now, tell us about the intervention. This information goes on the first page of the report, which is meant to provide context for the reader and enable them to understand what the intervention is all about.

interventionName.max: Intervention name must be no more than 30 characters

participants.integer: Number of participants must be an integer
participants.positive: Number of participants must be positive
participants.min: Number of participants cannot be zero or negative

businessCaseLength.max: Business case length must be from 1 to 100

interventionDescription.max: Description must be no more than 600 characters

purpose.max: Purpose must be no more than 100 characters

activities.min: At least one activity is required

targetGroup.title: Describe your target group
targetGroup.description: Describe the target group you are working with, to provide further context for the reader, and allow them to understand what people you help through your intervention.

targetGroupDescription.max: Target group description must be at most 600 characters

riskFactors.max: Risk factors must be at most 600 characters

stakeholders.title: Who are your stakeholders?
stakeholders.description: Create a list of the stakeholders relevant for your intervention. For each stakeholder, an amount is inserted, fx. 100 participants or 1 municipality. The changes are, which social changes, or outcomes, this stakeholder experiences from their perspective.

stakeholderName.max: Stakeholder name must be at most 30 characters

stakeholderAmount.positive: Number of stakeholder participants must be positive
stakeholderAmount.min: Number of stakeholder participants cannot be zero or negative

fundingSource.title: Describe your funding sources
fundingSource.description: Show who funded the project, the total cost and how much each funding source accounts for in percentages.

totalCosts.typeError: Total costs must be a number

fundingSourceName.max: Funding source name must be at most 60 characters

outcomes.title: Describe your outcomes
outcomes.description: Now, the outcomes which the intervention creates for the target group, should be added. You can have all the outcomes you want, and each outcome can have one or more benificiaries.'

method.title: Describe your methodology
method.description: This section is to provide the reader with a meta perspective on the applied methods used for the evaluation. For example, it could include one or more of the following:
method.limit: You can use up to 3000 characters, including spaces.

confirmation.title: All done! Ready for your report?
confirmation.description: Your SROI report is ready to be generated, but if you have any last minute changes, just use the right-hand-side menu to navigate.
